## PagesAnalyticsConfig.pageDomain property

The domain of the page. If none is specified, the hostname for the site ID is used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pageDomain?: string;
```

## Remarks

The domain string must include the scheme (e.g. https://foo.com).
